lead_paragraph: Women’s soccer in South Africa will take another giant stride from a time when society frowned on girls playing the game when the national side competes at the Olympic Games on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Soccer-South Africa's Women to Take Stride to Acceptance
headline.main: Soccer-South Africa's Women to Take Stride to Acceptance

snippet: Women’s soccer in South Africa will take another giant stride from a time when society frowned on girls playing the game when the national side competes at the Olympic Games on Wednesday....
